extendedInfo.description: The fashion! The stars! The glitz! The winners! It's all here in this unparalleled and FREE Android app from E!, the leader in red carpet entertainment. This Live From the Red Carpet app lets you experience total VIP access to Hollywood's hottest events, right at your fingertips. You'll hit all the big shows, live and in high-gloss interactive bliss: the Academy Awards, Golden Globes, Grammy Awards, SAG Awards, and red carpets of weekly movie premieres and film fests. This app brings you celeb news, A-list fashion photos and interview videos from awards season's marquee events. Get up-close celebrity interviews with our massive video coverage, and dive into the GlamCam 360, our futuristic Matrix-like fashion cam! You'll have instant access to hundreds of E! articles, breaking down everything from the winners and upsets to the shows' best (and worst) moments. Donât miss a second of the red carpet action, download the Free Live From the Red Carpet app today!

reviews.title: Problems
reviews.comment: Been having tons of products lens ever since the last update... Ads have taken over picture galleries and then shut the app down after seeing one or two pictures. Galleries also really slow to update with new photos.

reviews.title: Live Stream?

reviews.title: Horrible Live &  Pre-Show companion
reviews.comment: Horrible companion to watching live & preshows.  The 2 main things that were worth the watching was the Kermit/Darren Criss video which was not playable (nor was it playable on n android web browser)  also live feed of \"poolside\" feed was audio-only even after several reboots (on a strong wifi connection).  Very disappointing.
